languages.text: "Да. Лишиться меня, оставить себе лишь воспоминания о Джай Хейдари — звучит действительно ужасно. Кто захотел бы носить на сердце печать столь ужасных сожалений?"
"Yes. To lose me, to be left with only the memories of Jae Heydari, sounds truly terrible. Who would wish to bear the stamp of such awful regret on their heart?"
languages.original_text: "Да. Лишиться меня, оставить себе лишь воспоминания о Джай Хейдари — звучит действительно ужасно. Кто захотел бы носить на сердце печать столь ужасных сожалений?"

traits.locale_text: "Yes. To lose me, to be left with only the memories of Jae Heydari, sounds truly terrible. Who would wish to bear the stamp of such awful regret on their heart?"

languages.text: «Sí. Perderme y quedarse con solo los recuerdos de Jae Heydari sería algo terrible. ¿Quién querría la marca de semejante pesar en su corazón?».
languages.original_text: "Yes. To lose me, to be left with only the memories of Jae Heydari, sounds truly terrible. Who would wish to bear the stamp of such awful regret on their heart?"

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Perderme y quedarse con solo los recuerdos de Jae Heydari sería algo terrible. ¿Quién querría la marca de semejante pesar en su corazón?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “是的，失去我，只剩下婕伊·海达利的记忆，这听起来真的很可怕。谁会愿意在自己的心上留下如此可怕的悔恨呢？”
languages.original_text: "Yes. To lose me, to be left with only the memories of Jae Heydari, sounds truly terrible. Who would wish to bear the stamp of such awful regret on their heart?"

traits.locale_text: “是的，失去我，只剩下婕伊·海达利的记忆，这听起来真的很可怕。谁会愿意在自己的心上留下如此可怕的悔恨呢？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「そうだよ、あたしを失って、ジェイ・ヘイダリとの思い出だけが残るなんて、ほんとに最悪だ。そんなヒドイ後悔の刻印を心に刻みたいやつなんていないでしょ？」
languages.original_text: "Yes. To lose me, to be left with only the memories of Jae Heydari, sounds truly terrible. Who would wish to bear the stamp of such awful regret on their heart?"

traits.locale_text: 「そうだよ、あたしを失って、ジェイ・ヘイダリとの思い出だけが残るなんて、ほんとに最悪だ。そんなヒドイ後悔の刻印を心に刻みたいやつなんていないでしょ？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne vous le fais pas dire. Me perdre, et rester avec le lointain souvenir de Jae Heydari pour seule compagnie est un sort peu enviable, en effet. Qui souhaiterait porter en son cœur le cuisant stigmate d'un regret aussi amer ? »
languages.original_text: "Yes. To lose me, to be left with only the memories of Jae Heydari, sounds truly terrible. Who would wish to bear the stamp of such awful regret on their heart?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous le fais pas dire. Me perdre, et rester avec le lointain souvenir de Jae Heydari pour seule compagnie est un sort peu enviable, en effet. Qui souhaiterait porter en son cœur le cuisant stigmate d'un regret aussi amer ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ja. Mich zu verlieren, nur noch die Erinnerungen an Jae Heydari zu haben, das klingt wirklich grausam. Wer würde den Stempel einer solch schrecklichen Reue auf seinem Herzen tragen wollen?"
languages.original_text: "Yes. To lose me, to be left with only the memories of Jae Heydari, sounds truly terrible. Who would wish to bear the stamp of such awful regret on their heart?"

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Mich zu verlieren, nur noch die Erinnerungen an Jae Heydari zu haben, das klingt wirklich grausam. Wer würde den Stempel einer solch schrecklichen Reue auf seinem Herzen tragen wollen?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yes. To lose me, to be left with only the memories of Jae Heydari, sounds truly terrible. Who would wish to bear the stamp of such awful regret on their heart?"

languages.text: "Evet. Beni kaybetmek, yalnızca Jae Heydari'nin anılarıyla kalmak kulağa gerçekten korkunç geliyor. Kim kalbinde böyle büyük bir üzüntünün izini taşımak ister ki?"
languages.original_text: "Yes. To lose me, to be left with only the memories of Jae Heydari, sounds truly terrible. Who would wish to bear the stamp of such awful regret on their heart?"

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Beni kaybetmek, yalnızca Jae Heydari'nin anılarıyla kalmak kulağa gerçekten korkunç geliyor. Kim kalbinde böyle büyük bir üzüntünün izini taşımak ister ki?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
